{"id":1758918750,"question_id":3897,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1756959640,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1758918750/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Number of Trapezoids II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countTrapezoids(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        // naive solution: n^4, 6e10\n        // possible solutions: n^2logn, n^3\n\n        auto sl = [](vector<int>& a, vector<int>& b) {\n            return (a[1] - b[1]) * 1.0L / (a[0] - b[0]);\n        };\n        auto cross = [&](int i, int j, int k, int m) {\n            auto i0 = points[i];\n            auto j0 = points[j];\n            auto k0 = points[k];\n            auto m0 = points[m];\n            return (i0[1] - j0[1]) * (k0[0] - m0[0]) == \n                   (i0[0] - j0[0]) * (k0[1] - m0[1]);\n        };\n        auto ok = [&](int i, int j, int k, int m) {\n            if (cross(i, j, k, m))\n                return true;\n            if (cross(i, k, j, m))\n                return true;\n            if (cross(i, m, j, k))\n                return true;\n            return false;\n        };\n\n        int N = (int)points.size();\n        int sum = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                for (int k=j+1; k<N; k++) {\n                    for (int m=k+1; m<N; m++) {\n                        sum += ok(i, j, k, m);\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-number-of-trapezoids-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1190}
